result.execSummary:
The defendant Lawrence Olivia Nelson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Total fine and costs in the amount of $705 to be paid by payment plan at a rate of $50 per month commencing May 1st, 2017 and to be paid on the first of each month thereafter.  Failure to pay will result in one day jail for each $25 owed for contempt of court.
Defendant is to submit a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Lawrence Olivia Nelson
Current: 111 E Woodruff St, Port Washington St, WI 53074   (Effective: 12-27-2016)
Prior: 111 Woodruff St, Port Washington St, WI 53074

Defendant Lawrence Olivia Nelson in court.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant submits waiver of right to attorney.  Court examines the defendant as to the waiver.  Court accepts the waiver, finding it to be free and voluntary.  Defendant submits plea questionnaire and waiver.  Court examines the defendant as to the waiver.  Defendant enters a guilty plea.  Court accepts the plea, finding it to be free and voluntary, and finds the defendant guilty as to their plea.  State makes recommendation as to sentencing.  Court renders judgment.
Further proceedings on March 7, 2017 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Lawrence Olivia Nelson in court.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant does not qualify for public defender representation.  Defendant intends to retain counsel.  Further proceedings scheduled for March 7, 2017 at 01:15 pm.
Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

ADDRESS INFO for Lawrence Olivia Nelson
Current: 111 Woodruff St, Port Washington St, WI 53074   (Effective: 12-27-2016)
Prior: 515 N Broadway, Green Bay, WI 54303

Defendant Lawrence Olivia Nelson appeared in court in custody via video from Ozaukee County Jail with Attorney Rachel Marie Boaz.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Counsel advises that the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation.   Counsel will waive reading of complaint.   State recommends $500 signature bond with conditions.  Plea hearing scheduled for January 9, 2017 at 10:00 am.
Per Dispatch, subject is in custody on warrant

Defendant Lawrence Olivia Nelson not in court. Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds probable cause.  Upon defendant's failure to appear, court orders warrant to issue. Forfeit any bail.
